title: Potential health risks to disinfection workers from exposure to active substances in COVID-19 biocidal products
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Gihong Min, Jihun Shin, Dongjun Kim, Youngtae Choe, Jaemin Woo, Kil Yong Choi, Jangwoo Lee, Mansu Cho, Jongdae Lee, Jin-Sung Ra, Wonho Yang
